title: Brown Draped Cotton Dress with Embroidery
image_prompt: Flat-lay product render of a brown draped flowing cotton dress with full sleeves and crew neck, featuring delicate tonal embroidery on bodice and sleeve cuffs, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and trims

techpack.care_instructions: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle, line dry

provenance.inspiration: Minimalist bohemian elegance with artisanal embroidery
